teaser: A Ford executive recently whipped up controversy when he said the carmaker knows when drivers of its cars break traffic laws. Ford's CEO later said that Ford doesn't -- and won't -- track cars. He also called for better privacy laws as cars add new location-based technology. And a new study from Georgia Tech looks at how words you use can determine whether your Kickstarter campaign reaches its goal.

And a new study from Georgia Tech looks at how words you use can determine whether your Kickstarter campaign reaches its goal.
title: Marketplace Tech for Thursday, January 16, 2014
